channel.title: Krishna Bajpai - AI/ML Blog
channel.description: Expert insights on AI, Machine Learning, and Quantum Computing from Krishna Bajpai - Elite AI/ML Consultant with 28+ research projects and Fortune 500 experience.

item.title: How I Reduced Customer Churn by 34% Using Machine Learning
item.description: ML churn prediction reduced customer churn 34% & saved $2.3M annually. Complete case study: feature engineering, XGBoost model, production deployment. Free code examples.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Computer Vision Quality Control: 99.7% Accuracy in Manufacturing
item.description: Computer vision quality control achieved 99.7% accuracy in automotive manufacturing using YOLO defect detection. Edge deployment & production pipeline. Complete guide.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Real-Time NLP Sentiment Analysis System That Increased Conversions by 28%
item.description: NLP sentiment analysis increased e-commerce conversions 28% using BERT models. Real-time processing, customer insights & personalization. Step-by-step implementation guide.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Time Series Forecasting for Supply Chain: 15% Cost Reduction Through ML
item.description: Machine learning time series forecasting reduced supply chain costs by 15% through demand prediction. LSTM, ARIMA, and production deployment strategies included.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Real-Time Fraud Detection: How ML Saved $50M in Prevented Losses
item.description: Real-time ML fraud detection system prevented $50M in losses with 99.2% accuracy. Graph neural networks, ensemble methods, and production pipeline architecture.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Scaling Recommendation Systems to 100M+ Users: A Complete Guide
item.description: Scaled recommendation system to 100M+ users improving engagement 45%. Matrix factorization, deep learning, distributed computing, and real-world architecture patterns.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Building a Visual Workflow Editor with React Flow and n8n Architecture
item.description: Complete guide to building visual workflow editors using React Flow. N8n-inspired architecture, node-based interfaces, and production deployment strategies.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Production Deployment of NVIDIA Parakeet ASR: Complete Implementation Guide
item.description: Deploy NVIDIA Parakeet ASR models in production environments. Complete guide covering model optimization, scaling, and enterprise integration strategies.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: Hybrid Quantum-Classical Optimization Library: Advanced Implementation
item.description: Advanced hybrid quantum-classical optimization library implementation. Quantum annealing, variational algorithms, and enterprise applications in logistics and finance.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai

item.title: AI-Powered HRMS System: Complete Architecture and Implementation
item.description: Design and implement AI-powered HRMS systems with intelligent automation. Complete architecture covering talent acquisition, performance analytics, and employee insights.
item.dc:creator: Krishna Bajpai
